featured.text: But it’s the parents’ job to serve a variety of foods and expose their children to healthy dieting habits.
Tom was very ill a week ago, but now he looks healthy.
Since many of our house plants are from humid jungle environments, they need _____ air to keep them green and healthy.
People who desire a ______ figure should exercise regularly and maintain healthy eating habits.
Besides working, regular exercise is essential to keep the astronauts healthy in microgravity.

other.text: Yet, is water always the healthiest drink we can 21 ?
In this course, you will learn __(22)__ to cook two weeks of healthy, inexpensive meals in just one day.
(H) … and is sure to have a healthy body.
In order to stay healthy and fit, John exercises _____.
Keeping yourself healthy has to be your own 32 .

Zoe was rather healthy when she was found, and once under the care of the orphanage she was very happy, consuming six gallons of vitamin-rich milk a day and earning a reputation as a confident, naughty and mischievous youngster.
In these places people rest, get plenty of sleep, eat healthy food, drink water instead of wine, and exercise in various ways.
Isn’t it supposed to be a healthy choice? (F) Linda I liked it fine.
And the healthy and fun snack is ready to serve.
People drink tea to become rich and healthy.

definition.en_def: Beneficial to health; promoting good health.
definition.example: Eating fruits and vegetables is part of a healthy diet.
